subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Whether or not he is selected first in the N.B.A. Draft on Thursday, Kevin Durant has the skills to play all five positions and an intense focus that is unparalleled.
snippet: Whether or not he is selected first in the N.B.A. Draft on Thursday, Kevin Durant has the skills to play all five positions and an intense focus that is unparalleled.
